participant_1.background:
I have a baby monitor with a camera so I can check on my child from anywhere in the house.
I am proud of the creative projects I have made in my studio.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
I live a simple life, spending my days with my family and my vintage cars.

participant_2.background:
I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else.
I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer.
i work in accounting.
i play many instruments.
I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.

content.text: Hello! What a beautiful day, isn't it?
It's pretty hot today, but it's supposed to be even hotter tomorrow!
I'll be sure to stay inside then! I have a baby monitor so I can check on him from anywhere in the house.
That sounds like a great idea! I don't have a baby yet, but I can imagine how stressful it must be to leave them alone.
It can be, but it's also really rewarding. I love seeing him grow and learn new things every day.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you're a great parent.
What do you do for a living?
I'm an upholsterer. I make custom furniture and upholstery pieces for people's homes.
That's so cool! I've always been interested in woodworking, but I've never had the time to learn.
It's never too late to start! I've been doing it for about 10 years now and I still love it.
Maybe I'll look into it! Thanks for the inspiration.
You're welcome! What do you do for a living?
I work as an accountant. It's not as exciting as woodworking, but it pays the bills!
As long as you're happy, that's all that matters.
Exactly! I'm very lucky to have a good job and a close-knit family.
Me too! I'm really grateful for my life.
It sounds like you have a lot to be proud of!
I do! I'm a lucky guy.
